game.name: Liftoff®: FPV Drone Racing
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Liftoff® is a drone simulator that translates the rush of first-person view drone flight to the digital world. Join the biggest community for virtual FPV racing and freestyle!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Liftoff® is a drone simulator that translates the rush of first-person view drone flight to the digital world. Join the biggest community for virtual FPV racing and freestyle!

reviewHighlights.text: Now we're talking! Congratulations Lugus, you finally made it! Physics 2.0 is finally fun to fly. Don't get me wrong. I started out with Liftoff many...
Good game. I would say that the time I spent on here directly translated to the skills required to fly in the real world.
